open this locked door perhaps it will
reveal that we were born from a previous
incarnation a universe before our own
perhaps we will find that we are lost in
the multiverse just one universe of
countless others
or perhaps we will pry open the door to
find ourselves staring into an abyss
an aberration born from a random
fluctuation
our existence little more than a quantum
dream against a backdrop
of unending nothingness
you've been watching the entire history
of the universe don't forget to like and
subscribe and leave a comment to tell us
what you think
thanks for watching i will see you next
time
